What aerospace analysts are saying about Boeing's mid-air blowoutA serious mid-air breach has landed planemaker Boeing in the regulatory crosshairs just as it was awaiting approval of new models of its best-selling MAX jet. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 04:14:33 GMT O26ZDWL3SJJINFQGA3AW6BAUC4 https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/what-aerospace-analysts-are-saying-about-boeings-mid-air-blowout-2024-01-08/Reuters商业航空航天与国防
Ignoring Taiwan's complaints, more Chinese balloons spotted over straitTaiwan's defence ministry said it detected three more Chinese balloons flying over the Taiwan Strait on Sunday, one of which crossed the island, the latest in a spate of such balloons the ministry says it has spotted over the past month. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 02:44:36 GMT MZVGLYUCP5IUDGULHDJMI7QKMA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/ignoring-taiwans-complaints-more-chinese-balloons-spotted-over-strait-2024-01-08/Reuters世界亚太地区

China Evergrande's EV unit says vice chairman detained, stock plungesChina Evergrande New Energy Vehicle Group said on Monday an executive director Liu Yongzhuo, who is the firm's vice chairman, has been detained, sending the stock tumbling as much as 23% in resumed trade. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 01:37:14 GMT PLVU65RHRFNMFMYA67CGEXSVR4 https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-evergrande-ev-unit-says-trade-shares-halted-2024-01-08/Reuters世界中国
China to sanction 5 US manufacturers over arms sales to Taiwan - ministryChina will sanction five U.S. military manufacturers in response to the latest round of U.S. arms sales to Taiwan, a foreign ministry spokesperson said on Sunday. Sun, 07 Jan 2024 01:38:59 GMT T33CLIXP3RJ3NGOONLMYTVWTHA https://www.reuters.com/world/china-sanction-5-us-manufacturers-over-arms-sales-taiwan-ministry-2024-01-07/Reuters世界
Myanmar rebels take control of key town near Chinese borderA Myanmar rebel alliance has gained control of a key town along the country's volatile northern border with China after weeks of fierce fighting with junta troops, the alliance and the junta said. Sat, 06 Jan 2024 05:51:48 GMT KWDCKJMJXZLJXAELVKUN7RDWSE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/myanmar-rebels-take-control-key-town-near-chinese-border-2024-01-06/Reuters世界亚太地区
